# Ehsanul Haque Siam - AI Engineer & Software Developer

> Personal portfolio of Ehsanul Haque Siam, an AI Engineer and Software Developer from Dhaka, Bangladesh. Computer Science student at AIUB, published researcher, and open source contributor.

## About

Ehsanul Haque Siam is an AI Engineer and Software Developer specializing in machine learning, natural language processing (NLP), and full-stack development. He is a Computer Science student at the American International University-Bangladesh (AIUB) where he has been recognized with 3 Dean's List awards for academic excellence (CGPA 3.95, 3.89, 3.75+).

He has published research in medical AI â€” specifically "Beyond NER: A Comparative Benchmark of Medical BERTs for Multi-Label Adverse Drug Reaction Classification" at IDAA 2025, published as a Taylor & Francis Book Chapter. His work involves fine-tuning domain-specific BERT models (BioBERT, PubMedBERT) for healthcare applications.

Contact: ehsanul.siamdev@gmail.com
Location: Dhaka, Bangladesh
Website: https://ehsanulhaquesiam.netlify.app/
GitHub: https://github.com/EhsanulHaqueSiam
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/EhsanulHaqueSiam/

## Featured Projects

### Indian Claypit - Restaurant Website
Premium restaurant website with online ordering system, 50,000+ customers served, 4.9 star rating.
Tech: React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Framer Motion
URL: https://indianclaypit.com/

### BetaScript - Tech Agency Website
Tech services agency with Bangladesh-USA partnership, 150+ happy clients, 100% satisfaction rate.
Tech: React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Framer Motion
URL: https://betascript.online/

### Student Management System
Enterprise-grade database system with 17 GitHub stars, 6-8ms query performance, 3NF normalized schema.
Tech: Java, MySQL, JDBC, Design Patterns
GitHub: https://github.com/EhsanulHaqueSiam/StudentManagementSystem

### Spotify Sentiment Analysis
NLP sentiment classifier analyzing 52,702 Spotify reviews with 85-90% accuracy using MultinomialNB.
Tech: Python, scikit-learn, NLP, TF-IDF, Naive Bayes
GitHub: https://github.com/EhsanulHaqueSiam/spotify-review-sentiment

### BD News Scraper & Analytics
Production-grade data engineering platform scraping 74+ Bangladeshi news sources daily with ML analytics.
Tech: Python, Scrapy, FastAPI, Docker, GitHub Actions
GitHub: https://github.com/EhsanulHaqueSiam/BDNewsPaperScraper
Kaggle: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/ehsanulhaquesiam/bangladesh-news-articles

### Mario's Multiverse Adventure
2D platformer game with 3 levels, OpenGL rendering, physics engine, SFML audio.
Tech: C++, OpenGL, SFML, SQLite, CMake
GitHub: https://github.com/EhsanulHaqueSiam/MarioMultiverseAdventures

### Hotel Management System
Java Swing application with 15 GitHub stars, Bkash/Nagad payment integration, 171 commits.
Tech: Java, Swing, File I/O, OOP
GitHub: https://github.com/EhsanulHaqueSiam/HotelManagementSystem

## Publications

### Beyond NER: Medical BERTs for Multi-Label ADR Classification
- Conference: International Conference on Intelligent Data Analysis and Applications (IDAA 2025)
- Published: Dec 2025, Taylor & Francis Book Chapter
- Topic: Fine-tuning LLMs and Medical BERT architectures for multi-label adverse drug reaction classification on PsyTAR dataset

### Unfolding Emerging Issues in the Context of Changing Climatic Scenario
- Conference: 2nd South Asian Conference on Climate
- Date: Sep 2024
- Topic: Statistical analysis of emerging issues under changing climatic scenarios
